name: DEROOT RISING
description:
DEROOT RISING is a beat em up building crawler. You play as a bloody vengeful tree hellbent on killing all capitalists using your roots and acorns. The capitalists have taken extreme measures to stop you by creating the ultimate mecha tree. Can you get to the top and kill the mecha tree before time runs out?

CONTROLS

MOVEMENT: WASD, SPACE to jump

KILL MOVES: V to  stab, IJKL to shoot

CLIMB: button mash SPACE to victory

CREDITS

Tahjeante Webb
